title: Tyson Rinehart @ JAFAX 2022
content:
JAFAX is excited to announce that Tyson Rinehart, an accomplished voice actor of animé and video games, and ADR screenwriter for English language dialog for a number of recent series.

His voice acting talents have been on a number of shows and games, including "Steins;Gate", "Tokyo Ghoul", "That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime", "SMITE", and "Orcs Must Die! Unchained". As an ADR screenwriter, he has provide screenplay dialog translations for "Ascendance of a Bookworm", "Dies Irae", "Promised Neverland", and more.

To find out more about him, stop by his bio!
